Banner.Description: I have 15 years of experience developing systems, processes, interfaces, and technological solutions in different environments. I am dedicated to writing reusable and scalable code in Angular and React for Front-end and Node Js for Back-end, applying good practices and development standards.
AboutMe.Title: About Me
AboutMe.Paragraphs: In 15 years of experience I have covered many roles: Systems Analyst, Backend Developer, Frontend Developer, and Technical Lead. I love contributing my knowledge to create new things that help solve problems.
My capabilities also include implementing system improvements, optimizing sites, standardizing patterns, and suggesting and executing ideas that add value to the project I am working on.
I also program things for my personal use, whether for hobby or utility.
Some of the technologies I have trained and worked with include (but are not limited to):
Experience.Title: Experience

Positions.Title: Lead Software Engineer
Description: Created multiple web apps with (Angular, Node JS) to solve for automation and create savings by reducing SME allocation
Accomplished full stack developer with frontend/backend development
Led the creation of CI/CD pipelines configured for all our apps in cloud through Kubernetes and Docker
GCP Cloud and SaaS maintained apps
Google Vertex AI with simple chat and text prompt simple apps utilizing in house models
Manage GitHub repos with GitHub Actions configuration
Mentored teammates with Kubernetes setups and skillset building to unify team
Committee member to collaborate on improvement points for the company’s annual employee surveys

Positions.Title: Software Engineer II
Description: Continuously maintain and update our internal facing apps that contain .Net Core APIs, Node JS, React
Built new Teams tool (React, Node JS) for our team which serves over 300 Dev managers to assign and structure their individual contributors, scrum masters & managers
Internal CI/CD pipelines configured for all our apps to have instant and safe deployments through Kubernetes and Docker
Upgraded current angular site to React and streamlined UI with better user experience
Full stack developer capable of backend/frontend development
Maintain and replaced all Tableau reporting with Power BI to cut licensing costs and centralized reporting
Created Premium workspaces and Power BI pipelines for seamless deployments
Constantly engaged with user testing and recommendation throughout Project lifecycle

Positions.Title: Tax Data Engineer II
Description: Work with UTE product daily to create SQL reporting for end users to perform daily tasks in order to better provide tax services to clients
Created Cognos reporting solutions to automate real-time data pulls to reduce business processing time

Create/Manage SQL databases for our internal customers to report important statistical data to improve our department’s reliability in catching mass issues and agency related problems within Select Services.
Pursuing Azure certification to assist in more cloud-based technologies
Currently learning Node JS, Express, React & C# for an inhouse highly visible Amendments app our team is responsible for
Constantly in communication with team members and leadership daily to gain requirements and/or attend team meetings
Assist team members in training around SQL programming, SSIS, PowerShell and/or Cognos development for better team productivity and cross-training
Agile/Kanban methodology with bi-weekly sprints

Created alerting automation and file system maintenance with PowerShell scripting
Worked with many internal departments i.e., networking, SaaS, Security to ensure application compliance and integrity
Planned, designed, and implemented application database code objects, such as stored procedures, views and SQL jobs on SQL Server

Collaborated with business users to create automation and continuous support post go-live
Managed all phases of Software Development Life Cycle that includes Requirements, Design, Development, Testing, Deployment and Support
Experience with Kanban
Used JIRA daily to track and maintain project items and daily support tickets
Utilized confluence software as a document repository for all project related documents and training materials
Developed Service requests and Incidents in ServiceNow platform using JavaScript

Positions.Title: BI Developer
Description: Obtained 6 Certifications in Epic Software which is a nationwide used medical platform
Planned, designed, implemented and maintained SQL stored procedures, queries, views, Dynamic SQL, SSIS, and SSRS
Developed many reports across medical facilities in big bang roll out over a period of just 6 months
Managed all phases of Software Development Life Cycle that includes Requirements, Design, Development, Testing, Deployment and Support
Experience with Agile and SCRUM
Created/Integrated Crystal Reports into Epic Software for varying medical practices

Description: Created/managed SQL stored procedures, functions, queries and views, Dynamic SQL, SSIS, SSRS
Monitored Test & Prod SQL databases

Lead developer on first e-commerce site project. Required integration SQL scripts and HTML coding

Managed all phases of Software Development Life Cycle that includes Requirements, Design, Development, Testing, Deployment and Support

FeatureProjects.Title: My Projects
FeatureProjects.Label: Highlighted Project

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: GSWhiz
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: Web application for customer SFTP management that includes over 10,000 clients. Very extensive and complex with various functions made in Angular and Node JS. It comprises of logic to generate SSH/PGP keys and customer hosting sessions. The application utilizes JWT, Containerization, Samba libraries, vault storage, Mongo and more!

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: InsightIQ
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: Application utilizing Google Vertex AI and function calling to a BigQuery data source. It has context loading, prompt engineering, historical data, and more. Developed in Angular and Node JS.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Monte Carlo
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: Agile Kanban focused website to assist 100's of Dev managers on streamlining their JIRAs, priorities and Time to Resolve. Site utilizes Typescript, SQL Server and simulation functions. Developed in Angular, Node JS and .Net Core.

Contact.Title: Reach Out!
Contact.Content: I will be glad to hear from you if you want to discuss new opportunities. Write to me, and I will respond as soon as I see your message.
